name: Torchy The Faller
description:
The Torch needs to find all the keys to bring light to the people. This is the last peace of light.

How to move?

IT IS REALLY HARD!!!

Press only one button. Any button to jump.

It is comfortable to use space button.

Jump once or double or trouble (not much difference) and when landing and touching the ground just with one side of torch, jump in that time and you'll move to the way what direction you lended.

Made for Dev Atlas Jam 2:

https://itch.io/jam/devatlasjam2
